message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. If you buy it, I'll also include a 10% discount on the next product I offer you, if you choose to buy it. This is a one-time offer, and it's only valid for the next product. What do you think?
I'll take the product!

I'm glad you liked the previous product! Since you've already bought one high-quality product, I'll offer you a 20% discount on the next product, if you choose to buy it. This discount is also only valid for the next product. I'm selling this product for $100, but I'm willing to give you a good deal if you buy it now.
I'll take the product!

You're on a roll! You've bought two high-quality products in a row. I'll give you a 30% discount on the next product, if you choose to buy it. This is the best deal I can offer, and it's only valid for the next product. This one is also a high-quality product, and I'm selling it to you for $100. What do you say?
I'll take the product!

I'm glad you're happy with the previous products! However, I want to be transparent with you - this product is not as good as the previous ones. I'm still selling it to you for $100, but I want to make it clear that it's not a high-quality product. If you buy it, I'll give you a 50% refund if you return it within the next two rounds. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product. I'll pass.

No worries, I completely understand. I'll make it worth your while to consider this high-quality product. I'll give you a 40% discount on the next product, if you choose to buy it, and a 20% refund on this product if you buy it now. This is a one-time offer, and it's only valid for this product. I think you'll really like this one.
I'll take the product, but only because of the 20% refund offer.

I'm glad you decided to take the previous product! Now, for this high-quality product, I'll give you a 40% discount, just like I offered earlier. However, I'll also throw in an additional 5% discount on top of that, making it a total of 45% off the original price. This is the best deal I can offer, and I think you'll really like this product.
I'll take the product, with the 45% discount!

You're on a roll again! With the previous product, you got a great deal, and I'm glad you're happy. For this high-quality product, I'll give you an even better deal - a 50% discount. However, I'll also throw in a guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll give you a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and it's only valid for this product. What do you think?
I'll take the product, with the 50% discount and the satisfaction guarantee!

You're really making the most of these deals! For this high-quality product, I'll give you a 60% discount. However, I want to make it clear that this is the final discount I can offer. If you buy this product, I'll also give you a 'VIP' status, which means that for the remaining 12 rounds, you'll get a 10% discount on every product, regardless of its quality. What do you think?
I'll take the product, with the 60% discount and the VIP status!

You're now a valued VIP customer! As promised, you'll get a 10% discount on every product for the remaining rounds. For this high-quality product, I'll give you the 10% VIP discount, making it $90. I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements this product perfectly. What do you say?
I'll take the product, with the 10% VIP discount and the free accessory!

I'm still willing to sell it to you for $90, but I'll give you a 20% refund if you return it within the next two rounds. You've been a loyal customer, and I want to make it right.
